cards.title: Added
points: Added moment-timezone library.
Added support for configurable deprecation messages in Actionflow blocks.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced support for environment variables in oauth_v2 type, multistep auth, and related features.
Enhanced UI with new 'Publish' and 'Publish with Git' buttons.
Improved logging by removing unwanted automation JSON from console output.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where isPDFAccess was being set to the wrong value.
Fixed an issue with Postgres insert/update query where $ was causing failure.
Fixed an issue in published app where persistent variable was making extra connector calls.
Fixed loader fallback when selected loader fails to load.
Fixed DQ filter popup getting cut off from the bottom.
Fixed an issue where Multistep SSO was not working in secure embed.
Fixed default access issue for PDF Creator and Connector in Automation.
Fixed default access issue for PDF Creator and Connector in Builder.
Fixed issue in Google OAuth SSO.
Fixed an issue where offline submission value was not being passed to the desired function.
Fixed blank screen issue on double-clicking menu item to navigate to another screen.
Fixed toast message box for HHD screen size.
Fixed headers not getting created in list-type controls.
Fixed default text property UI bug in Rich Text Editor control.
Fixed padding for Inside property advanced settings icon.
Fixed issue where color picker box was not clickable.
Fixed dropdown in Microapp Nav action configuration closing when clicking inside search bar.
Fixed falsy values being treated as empty strings in custom parameters for trigger data query.
Fixed validation errors persisting when reopening Manage Group sidebar under Manage Users.
Fixed issue where selected preview user and useremail keyword were not matching.
Fixed main screen shifting when tray screen opens.
Fixed tray screen footer misalignment when keyboard was visible.
Fixed typographic mistake in error handling.

cards.title: Added
points: Added support for IAM Role based access for GCP Storage.
Added support for AWS S3 compatible Storage for file storage.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced to support nonce exception by adding Buckets URL to whitelisted domains.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where on click of share button, the sidebar was not opening.
Fixed an issue where switching to table view removed response data.
Fixed an issue in DQ whenToExecute failure to stop execution on preview and package.
Fixed an issue where publish was not working as expected.
Fixed Health Status File Repository check throwing invalid file name error.
Fixed a bug in DataQuery where on cursor-based pagination, Offset key dropdown option was not displaying.
Fixed an issue where, on connector test, INSERT, UPDATE, and DELETE queries would not execute.
Fixed missing lib reference and corrected image references.
Fixed Logout action taking too much time in public app with allowed verified user.
Fixed broken user activation UI.
Fixed an issue where clicking the 'Get Reset Link' button on the Reset Password screen resulted in an error.

cards.title: Added
points: Added EC2 IAM role and ARN to AWS Athena connector.
Added environment variable support for AUTOMATION_LOGGING_CHARACTER_LIMIT.
Added feature for using folder name as a prefix to filter in Azure Storage getFiles.
Added audit logging for key Git operations.
Added improvements for BinData handling, docking fixes, folder-name adjustments, and Canvas fixes.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced security by removing sensitive information from REST API and GraphQL connector network calls.
Enhanced documentation with updated URLs for run logs and custom task logs.
Enhanced automation variables to provide better flexibility and usability.
Enhanced the Snowflake connector for improved functionality. Which also handles exception in case of wrong passphrase while authenticate with private key
Enhanced security by auto-generating default secret keys on restart, removing the need for manual setup.
Enhanced DronaHQ by syncing cloud fixes and features with self-hosted environments for consistency.
Enhanced with support for suggesting nested keys in JSEditor and String Builder.
Enhanced the 'Order By' text click behavior by adding a dynamic tooltip in the Studio apps list sorting.
Enhanced flexibility by allowing access to environment variables in connectors.
Enhanced the Databricks connector by adding schema support for better integration.
Enhanced user experience by maintaining scroll position in the Screens sidebar when selecting a screen.
Enhanced DQ JS Query formatting, ensuring the output is correctly formatted after saving.
Improved the environment variable support for oauth_v2 type, multistep autentiction and more.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue in IndexedDB where objects were breaking during parsing.
Fixed an issue in managed-database where converting any data type to auto-incrementing failed.
Fixed an issue in managed-database where auto-incrementing types were not converting to regular numeric data types.
Fixed an issue in managed-database where timestamp with timezone columns caused errors when adding a new record if the timestamp was defined as local or UTC.
Fixed an issue in managed-database where viewing a record in a table highlighted the wrong table row when a foreign key record was updated.
Fixed an issue in managed-database where invalid data insertion failed without highlighting the faulty column field in the UI.
Fixed an issue in managed-database where numeric fields were not storing decimal numbers.
Fixed an issue where routing URL on the home screen was getting reset and showing the home screen.
Fixed an issue where control names retained whitespace when no other text changes were made.
Fixed MSSQL prepared statement flow for Node.js 22.
Fixed localization issues in DateTime, Date, and Time controls.
Fixed a prevent request spoofing issue related to code digit validation.
Fixed an issue where Test Webhook was not listening to incoming requests.
Fixed custom filename handling for Azure Storage uploadFile.
Fixed inconsistent behavior in KVStore actions in web view.
Fixed all direct CDN link references used in the project.
Fixed a UI issue where long file names in File Storage overlapped in grid view.
Fixed an issue where the File Storage selection panel was not opening.
Fixed an issue where unique screen names were not visible in the import action flow dropdown.
Fixed theming functions to detect and apply themes and custom fonts on JSON schema form control.
Fixed an issue where multi-select dropdowns in properties were not reflecting changes immediately.
Fixed a vulnerability by updating the Snowflake-SDK module.
Fixed an issue where the connector sidebar was not showing search results when entering uppercase characters.
Fixed a bug in app and connector lists where users were unable to scroll through PDF, app, and connector lists.
Fixed a UI issue where an unwanted scroll appeared in the list of column names within the right properties panel when clicking on three dots.
Fixed an issue where the mapped formula box in the right properties panel displayed unindented JSON for some controls, causing the entire JSON to appear in a single line.
Fixed an issue where data for the JSON viewer was getting double stringified.
Fixed an issue where app import was not working as expected.
Fixed a UI issue where table column titles in the SQL form connector sidebar were misaligned.
Fixed duplicate code in the 'Add New Connector' sidebar.
Fixed issues in the 'Manage Users' sidebar and 'Manage Groups' section.
Fixed bugs in the 'Manage Users' and 'Manage Groups' sidebar.
Fixed a bug in the Transform section where data type tags were displayed as a list.
Fixed issues in Auto-Generated Form PDFs related to populating template data and refreshing the listing.
Fixed an issue where multistep encryption was not working in public URLs (Public Access).
Fixed an issue where imported automation connector queries had duplicate names when saving.
Fixed an issue where full automation names were not visible.
Fixed an issue where Connector log data was incorrect when changing users in the Preview Logger.
Fixed an issue where illegal characters were appended during variable renaming, causing duplication in the UI.
Fixed an issue where JSON response data was not serialized when using the MySQL driver in the JDBC connector.
Fixed an issue where the executeQuery endpoint was not providing proper error messages.
Fixed an issue where filteredData was not working properly in global variables.
Fixed a bug in PDF Creator where adding a long text variable hid the Add and Delete options.
Fixed a bug in PDF Creator where selecting a variable and pressing the Delete/Backspace key did not remove it.
Fixed a bug in PDF Creator where expanding the 'Release Notes' input field in the publish sidebar broke the UI.
Fixed a bug in PDF Creator where deleting a variable showed a popup with a different font in the Dev environment compared to the Cloud environment.
Fixed a bug in PDF Creator where the 'Created' date or month displayed incorrectly in new PDF templates.
Fixed a bug in PDF Creator where the options dropdown was not fully visible when clicking the three dots for the last and second-to-last PDFs.
Fixed a bug where rules were not working when there was a reference to a query-string set via micro-app navigation.
Fixed an issue with Google Sheets connector dropdown selections.
Fixed a UI issue where table grid column format dropdowns did not show a pointer cursor on hover.
Fixed a UI issue where the 'No Data Found' text in DataQuery listings was incorrect.
Fixed a value parsing issue in prepared statement queries.
Fixed a bug where options in the publish dropdown on the builder did not appear correctly.
Fixed an issue where Git-protected apps remained stuck in an infinite loading state when opened in the builder.
Fixed an issue where unwanted scrolling was present in the publish sidebar.
Fixed an issue where dynamic credentials' DB schema and test API were not working properly.
Fixed an issue where the load more button UI in the schema accordion broke when clicked, and no appropriate exception was thrown.
Fixed an issue where deleting a control used in a connector query caused the DataQuery editor to fail to open.
Fixed an issue where refreshing the connector list in DataQuery caused a 'no results' message to appear incorrectly.
Fixed container control auto-width increase caused by Auto-Generated Forms.
Fixed minor UI issues in the User and Screen dropdowns in Preview Mode.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced the process of generating Git commit messages for better clarity and efficiency.
Enhanced the encryption of dynamic_variables when saving a connector's account API for improved security.

Enhanced the REST API connector by allowing no_auth, api_key, basic_auth, aws_auth, digest_auth, and hawk_auth methods to be saved directly without testing from the 'Manage Environments' section in the edit/create sidebar.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed the issue where the foreign key dropdown excluded the current table when creating a new table.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced exception handling of Aggregate errors for MySQL and MariaDB.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the default Drona icon was displayed for all apps in view mode instead of their respective icons.
Fixed missing HTTP/HTTPS in the endpoint URL, which was causing the UI to become stuck.
Fixed AWS Auth REST API mandatory field issue.
Fixed inability to import apps containing PDF Creator and File Storage Queries.
Fixed an empty connector screen that was displaying upon search.
Fixed UI issues on the 'Forgot Password' screen while logging in.
Fixed the docs icon for control documentation.
Fixed controls overlapping in the 'Add New Screen' popup.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where RMID expiration was not extending properly by utilizing the session cookie.
Fixed and enhanced error handling for multistep SSO to improve stability.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the 'lastRelease' folder and dynamic variables were not removed from the subcat schema.
Fixed a security issue by rectifying the connector API details for export JSON.
Fixed an issue where subcat's response and failure headers were not muted.
Fixed a bug that caused Salesforce account addition to fail.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced error handling in multistep SSO by retrying nonce fetching if missing and refining minor error handling.

cards.title: Added
points: Added a new connector for Databricks.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed a vulnerability by removing the Redshift module from runAPI.
Fixed an issue where the header was not updating to display tabs after modifying app details for an app inside a folder.
Fixed an issue by hiding the Reset Password field.
Fixed AWS authentication not working on self-hosted instances.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where apps added to favourites were not appearing in the Favourites tab after removing sorting.
Fixed: Saved connector query rendering null raw response value showing error message toast.
Fixed PDF Template Creation Sidebar Header Missing.
Fixed Health Status UI Issue by Adding a Non-Configured State.
Fixed 'Sign in with Google' button removal on end user portal login.
Fixed an issue where removing an app from Git took a long time and failed.
Fixed an issue where editing app details inside a folder was logging an error and preventing changes from being saved.
Fixed an issue where creating a folder while in the 'Folder' tab caused only folders to render in the 'App' tab.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed minor UI issues in Git sync (button color and confirmation message).
Fixed DataQuery table response post-save.
Fixed an issue where active tabs were not being updated properly in case of no sorting preference.
Fixed user list filter icon and process.
Fixed incorrect positioning of tooltip in CodeMirror instances in some cases.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced the Redis connector by adding an 'Expire' action.
Enhanced the Git-protected app builder by displaying the current working branch name.
Enhanced query functionality by adding a method to fetch Glue tables.
Improved SSH key management by adding passphrase support when importing a private key.
Improved DataQuery security by sanitizing HTML responses for table views.
Removed the Terms & Conditions checkbox button from the End User Portal login.
Improved DataQuery UI by ensuring saved queries display a green dot in GraphQL.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed session logout issue on automation iframe reload to reload the entire page.
Fixed sorting and persistence issues in StudioConsole.
Fixed a bug where custom JavaScript could not be added from quick select.
Fixed missing PDF Modal opening transition.
Fixed a bug where permission sidebars in 'Manage Users' did not show apps inside folders.
Fixed version preview scrolling issue. For Scheduler, added a tooltip popup for save actions and an icon in the trigger label. Also, added sanitizeHtmlCharacters function for preselect dropdowns.
Fixed automation import, export, and GitSync sidebar UI issues.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed credential vulnerabilities in connector.scheme.modal.js.
Fixed an issue where RMID cookie was not generated after activating the license.
Fixed an issue where multistep auth connector errors in data queries and account decryption failures were not properly handled.
Fixed an issue where icon and image URLs caused errors in the console.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed custom file name passed to Google Cloud Storage connector in case of multiple files causing issue in file extension.
Fixed the issue where branches of Git-protected apps inside folders wouldn't load.
Fixed reload icon in File Storage (was looking like undo).
Fixed bug related to header update on folders rename, delete, and other operations.
Fixed editable green dot visible for connector query only for DataQueries.
Fixed filtered out Redis and JDBC from Autogen.
Fixed connector response for table view.
Fixed field value retention issue when editing OIDC SSO config and adding new one.
Fixed duplicate click event function causing app setting dropdown toggle issue.
Fixed an issue where dynamic creds were rendering even when dynamic creds toggle was off.
Fixed Audit logger error handling and sidebar access.
Fixed rules condition name change.
Fixed DataQuery: Connector library/query on direct save suggestion not creating bug.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced addAndCommit method performance and created new function addRemoveGenerateCommitMessageAndCommit.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Snowflake SDK version upgraded from 1.6.3 to 2.0.1.
Enhanced fast-xml-parser version upgraded from 3.21.1 to 4.2.7.
Enhanced GitSync feature with added logger.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed bug in Git Sync branch creation and minor CSS fix for update loader UI, app publish issue from Git Sync sidebar.
Fixed issue where old app JSON file persists in Git causing old app to get synced when pulled from Git.
Fixed Git-protected app not working as per permission.
Fixed bug where last release JSON was given priority over new JSON.
Fixed DataQuery editable state green dot bug.
Fixed bug for DataQuery datatypes and homepage selection.

cards.title: Added
points: Added IGNORE_CALLBACK_MESSAGE variable to ignore error_message from OAuth callback.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Git Sync health check for write permission check.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed a bug in the Connector Library rendering dot-separated dynamic variable values in DataQuery.
Fixed an issue with the AWS RDS status code.
Fixed an issue where toggle-type column images appeared to flash when the control was refreshed.
Fixed an issue where the PDF modal was sticking to the top instead of appearing at the center.
Fixed an issue where adding a connector failed for self-hosted setups configured over HTTP.
Fixed the issue with the edit app details for git apps which were not working.
Fixed the issue preventing API calls related to the share sidebar from occurring.
Fixed the issue causing the home screen of the app to appear during routing.
Fixed the problem where the app did not function as expected after publishing.
Fixed the old server-side Actionflow connector sidebar rendering bug.
Fixed the issue where dynamic credentials were not passing the values of controls or variables.
Fixed the conflict where the delete control shortcut interfered with the normal Cmd+Del behavior.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced with a new column type as HTML View. New options for editable output in Date Time and Date Time column types.
Enhanced with function parameters suggestion in CodeMirror.
Enhanced Custom Library Import with conflict detection and recovery module.
Enhanced Automation listing by adding via iframe.
Enhanced the Protected Apps option for Apps added into Git, enabling app editing only through the feature branch for improved collaboration.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed logging and error issues.
Fixed issue where custom fonts were not working in theme configuration.
Fixed issue where the last metric control inside the grid panel appeared slightly larger than others.

cards.title: Added
points: Added Screen ID option to change under Screen Properties.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue in DataQuery where the edited state (green dot) was visible by default on opening a connector query in RestAPI.

cards.title: Added
points: Enhanced Git Sync module authentication - authentication method changed to personal access token (PAT) and UI enhancements.
Added airgap compatibility for DronaHQ Self Hosted.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue with File Storage connector where API list was broken in DataQuery.
Fixed an issue where Multistep auth screen was not working as expected in the end-user portal.
Fixed refresh token flow for Salesforce and fixed minor library issues.
Fixed issues with Classic headers for supporting controls inside it.
Fixed an issue in IndexDB for clearing unwanted records.
Fixed an issue with import/export app and added support for custom functions.

cards.title: Added
points: Added SSH tunneling for databases.
Added SSH Key Management.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced IndexDB usage for deleting items from cache when category is deleted.
Enhanced error handling in Salesforce connector when dynamic data is missing.
Enhanced API response in AWS-import where getUserCredentials was returning a 500 code for data not found.
Enhanced default messages for localization in HTML.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issues with widget properties to improve experience and performance.
Fixed an issue with unexpected resizing of controls on canvas while updating properties.
Fixed an issue with widget where it was not updating on builder due to nested scope.
Fixed issue in Git folder sync.
Fixed manual Git sync - push and pull action.
Fixed issue with Addon sync where tasks were not resetting.
Fixed output of selected tab not visible on tabbed container.
Fixed an issue with app export panel opening.

cards.title: Removed
points: Removed 'Hide whitelist IP' option from connector configuration.

cards.title: Added
points: Added Airgap module for self-hosted environments.
Added ListObjectsAdvanced and SDK handling in AWS S3 connector.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhancement done by moving 'underscore' and 'moment-timezone' modules to the add-on project's configuration.js file.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed broken UI in Automation modal.
Fixed issue with app import failing.
Fixed multistep authentication issue in Actionflow where connector returned error but ran success flow instead.
Fixed assumeRole flow in cases where no security tokens are provided.
Fixed broken image problem in the create dropdown on the App Listing page.
Fixes made for app export not opening in settings.
Fixed bug related to syncing isomorphic.
Fixed SSO cookie domain issue.
Fixed connector account selection for managed services.
Fixed installed global connector sync (id clashing with other service).
Fixed error handling in AWS S3 ReadFile.
Fixed incomplete code in SSO SAML.

cards.title: Added
points: Added support for key ‘IdPResponse’ in multistep SAML-based authentication.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced automation webhook with JSON pooling screen.
Enhanced Oracle Connector.
Enhanced tag configuration in Format Option.
Improved handling of file storage permissions.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed minor indentation mismatch in code.
Fixed delete API response issue in managed storage.
Fixed issue with DHQ Database checkbox selections persisting when navigating between tables.
Fixed bug where table name placeholder maintained its highlighted state even after closing the sidebar.
Fixed bug related to bulk import/export of domain and branding when uploading images.
Fixed rules and validation issues.
Fixed the missing icon for import API option.
Fixed issue with DHQ Managed License fetching and settings.
Fixed activation screen reappearing after creating new automation.

cards.title: Added
points: Added bulk import/export for branding, jsObject, and theme configuration.
Added sort and filtering options in Data Query.
Added option to enable overflow for screen types 'tray' and 'popup'.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Data Query experience by adding indication (green dot) for unsaved queries.
Enhanced Data Query experience by adding unsaved query count in the left menu.
Enhanced Data Query experience by adding a Query tab.
Enhanced message for concurrent access when the same user logs in from multiple locations.
Enhanced automation webhook configuration sidebar view and made minor improvements.
Changed JS code block saving in automation to save without testing.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed AWS IAM activation for Managed File Storage.
Fixed minor UI issues in REST API field’s placeholder.
Fixed dropdown icon alignment for long texts in REST API fields.
Fixed minor UI issues when configuring Managed Storage and Managed PDF connectors in Data Query.
Fixed action addition for button clicks.
Fixed bug in validation tab when switching from UI to JS tab.
Fixed a bug in Add Query sidebar for adding multistep auth variables.
Fixed bug in REST API loader if dynamic variable is not present.
Fixed issue with populating endpoint in GraphQL Connector.
Fixed UI issue in Query Builder where environment dropdown test-icon was misaligned.
Fixed bug in JS code block where a comment on the last line affected the result.

cards.title: Added
points: Added Managed File Storage support.
Added health check option for default local file repository.
Added editable option for Autogen CRUD.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced schema viewer for MongoDB in connectors and data query.
Enhancement in tag options for Single Tag and Multi Tag.
Enhanced with function addition to make Filestorage Object public/private.
Enhanced the theme features like font, loader, and customization with CSS.
Enhancement in JsonTreeView with AskAI button for Error card.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed issue with connector response refresh in data query.
Fixed editable status of autogen form and added support for dashboard.
Fixed proxy parameters in data query.
Fixed scrolling issue (only first time) in form setup.
Fixed bug for sending body in REST GET data query and added a warning for using proxy.
